Hydras:

"What Kind of Danger?" said exceptical the Predacon leader 


From=
: Super Cyclonus 
Sent: Thursday, February 11, 2010 3:55 PM
To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
Subject: Re: New beginings


  

>"Welcome, welxome welcome"hi=
ssed Hydras to the 
>Minions"it seems that we meet again, my uninvited gues=
t... and I didnt expected 
>to see you again, what bring you back to my mag=
nificent Home?"

Cyclonus is the first to step from the elevator, followed =
closely by the ever cautious Scourge. Both of them take a moment to observe=
 the room, noting any defenses that are obvious and directed at them. Howev=
er that moment is brief as Cyclonus quickly orients himself on Hydras. As t=
he two step a few paces closer it is obvious to anyone who is paying attent=
ion to such things, that at the moment niether Cyclonus nor Scourge have an=
y faction markings - no Predacon, Decepticon or Minion symbols. 

The duo s=
topped before Hydras' throne as Cyclonus began to speak, "Greetings Hydras"=
 Cyclonus' voice and demeanor were calm and seemingly unaffected by the pos=
sible danger of this encounter as he continued. "We have come because dange=
r is soon coming to us, to all of us." Cyclonus' optics narrow slightly as =
if examining Hydras for something, "We have come to see if you are ready."
=

Even as Cyclonus spoke, Scourge glanced at Perceptor and Darkhawk, casuall=
y acknowledging their presence, even as he casually dismissed them, as he s=
tood protectively close to Cyclonus, he felt that things could get dangerou=
s in a hury. 

<TAG>

Preston
(Cyclonus/Scourge)
